segment.source: Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.0 supports a number of different deployment configurations.
segment.target: Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.0 supports a number of different deployment configurations.

segment.source: This section includes information you should consider about the deployment of DaRT 8.0 and step-by-step procedures to help you successfully perform the tasks that you must complete at different stages of your deployment.
segment.target: This section includes information you should consider about the deployment of DaRT 8.0 and step-by-step procedures to help you successfully perform the tasks that you must complete at different stages of your deployment.

segment.source: This section describes the different DaRT deployment options for your requirements and explains how to deploy them.
segment.target: This section describes the different DaRT deployment options for your requirements and explains how to deploy them.

segment.source: This section describes the methods you can use to create the DaRT recovery image and provides instructions to create the recovery image by using the DaRT Recovery Image wizard.
segment.target: This section describes the methods you can use to create the DaRT recovery image and provides instructions to create the recovery image by using the DaRT Recovery Image wizard.

segment.source: This section provides information to help you decide on the best DaRT recovery image deployment option for your requirements and provides instructions on how to deploy the recovery image.
segment.target: This section provides information to help you decide on the best DaRT recovery image deployment option for your requirements and provides instructions on how to deploy the recovery image.

segment.source: This section contains a deployment checklist that can help you to deploy DaRT.
segment.target: This section contains a deployment checklist that can help you to deploy DaRT.

segment.source: This technology is a part of the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP).
segment.target: This technology is a part of the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP).

segment.source: Enterprise customers can get MDOP with Microsoft Software Assurance.
segment.target: Enterprise customers can get MDOP with Microsoft Software Assurance.

segment.source: For more information about Microsoft Software Assurance and acquiring MDOP, see How Do I Get MDOP (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=322049).
segment.target: For more information about Microsoft Software Assurance and acquiring MDOP, see How Do I Get MDOP (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=322049).

segment.source: Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8 Administrator's Guide
segment.target: Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8 Administrator's Guide
